title: How to unsubscribe from Bolt Food (Bolt Plus)
description: Learn how to cancel your Bolt Food (Bolt Plus) subscription. Follow these steps to manage your subscription and avoid unwanted charges.

steps_1.title: Unsubscribe via Mobile App
steps_1.description:
* Open the Bolt App on your device.
* Go to your Profile within the app.
* Tap on 'Manage Subscription'.
* Select 'Cancel Subscription'.
* Confirm your cancellation.
* Check your billing cycle details to ensure cancellation is processed before the next billing date.
* Contact customer support via the Support section in the Bolt App if you encounter any issues.

seo_text: Cancel Bolt Food (Bolt Plus) subscription. Manage Bolt Plus auto-renewal. Stop Bolt Food charges. Bolt Food subscription cancellation guide. How to cancel Bolt subscription.
